name: Shadows - Lost Gems
description:
-Windows 1.2 update adjusted gravity and added more random levels-
-Android 1.3 update - more characters and levels-

Use arrow keys to move

Space bar to jump

C button to shoot laser blocks

Use laser blocks to jump on to help get across areas

This game is in early beta please leave a comment below on what you like don't like and want to to change or add to the game

-Updates coming soon-
  • adjustments to jump and gravity
  • more levels and power ups
  • enemies and different gems worth more points
  • un-lockable power ups and playable characters with gems
